title: A Kia EV6 Owner Says It Way More Efficient Than His 2017 Prius Prime , Using Just 10 Miles of Range for a 30 - Mile Drive , But Goes On to Say  I Cant Believe a Car at This Price Lacks Basic Prius Features Like Touch - to - Unlock Doors
